### Explanation:
The documents provide information about a film titled "Broadminded" (1931) and its release details, including the director Mervyn LeRoy. The query asks whether the language of the film 'Broadminded' is English. Given that it has an English title ("BROADMINDED") and was produced by Warner Brothers in 1931 during a period when Hollywood primarily produced films in English, we can infer that the language of the film is indeed English. Therefore, the answer is "yes."
